attributes.additional_details: To Bring DEMOCRACY to the island of Britain and end the 1000 year Royalist Regime
attributes.background: DECLARE the REPUBLICS of ANGLIA and ALBA with ULSTER being under joint Alba/Eire control

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions that call for the UK Government to unilaterally change the governance of constituent parts of the United Kingdom, as these decisions would need the consent of the people of Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Hold a referendum on English independence from the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312765

Remove the requirement for a section 30 order to hold an Independence Referendum: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318701

You could start a petition calling on the Government to hold referendums in Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland regarding their constitutional relationship with the UK, if that is what you want to happen.
